page.title: 05DE LA POLE INTERVIEW
page.content: {Question:-What is the average length {of the short stay patients? Answer:-About 6 weeks {Q:-Have you long stay patients? A:-Yes,the longest is 30 to 40 years, they came from the old hospital.The average length is about 18 months to ywo years. {Q:-Are there more women here than men? A:-Yes,approximately 3 to 1(ratio)in the womens favour. {Q:-Do certain patients have separate {rooms from others? A:-We have 1 or 2 separate side wards not all patients are in them, we are spilt down into small dormitories. {Q:-Do patients come from the whole of {the Humberside area or just Hull. A:-Hull mainly then Goole,Pocklington, Bridlington.
